title: Passing students in exam by giving more marks
transcript: she's a teacher in a Polyclinic or in a college and she did her best but her students were all uh either or lazy and because most likely it's a private institution the head of the institution wants her to pass them and gives them extra grades so is this permissible I says no this is totally prohibited especially if it's dealing with medicine and she's responsible for making people who are not worthy to practice this uh profession so she has to uh not comply even if she has to resign the job he if he wants to manipulate their marks and he wants to uh pass them all this is his problem you do not sign something that is not true
